Bash(git commit -m "fix: Migration script now handles NULL emails gracefully

The migration script was trying to set staff_email column to NOT NULL,
but existing records had NULL values. This caused the migration to fail.

Now the script:
1. Checks for NULL emails in the column
2. If NULL values exist, logs a warning and skips the NOT NULL constraint
3. Instructs user to run the sync endpoint to populate emails
4. After sync completes, emails can be made NOT NULL

This allows the migration to complete successfully on existing databases
even when they have incomplete data.
